column1: Smoque BBQ////After several visits to Smoque
column2: I've decided that a review needed to be concocted.  Am I going to tell you to not believe the hype?  To stop wasting your time waiting in line for an hour to get a big pile of brisket?  I'm afraid not.  However
column3: I do have some fundamental issues to address in terms of Smoque's food
